module.name: Call Flow Control
module.description: Call Flow manual toggle control - allows for two destinations to be chosen and provides a feature code that toggles between the two destinations.
module.changelog: *13.0.14* FREEPBX-12690 add view for destinations usage *13.0.13.1* FREEPBX-14022 Remove toggle all feature code as it was broken *13.0.13* Table sizing *13.0.12* FREEPBX-12275 add clicktoedit to password *13.0.11* Remove all cos references to hints *13.0.10* FREEPBX-12114 FREEPBX-12112 *13.0.9* FREEPBX-11228 Update destination link *13.0.8* FREEPBX-11169 FREEPBX-11165 *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10732 Fix destination link *13.0.6* Slideout menu *13.0.5* Better CoS checks *13.0.4* Fix and tweak to work *13.0.3* Fix popover resolves FREEPBX-8993 for daynght *13.0.2* FREEPBX-8689 - All Call Flow Toggle not working *13.0.1* FREEPBX-8689 *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-8299 Increase number of available call flow control flows *13.0.1alpha1* Skinning updates
